title: (BONUS EP) Clergy Crimes
description: This month's bonus episode sheds some holy light on spiritual hierarchy. Topics include the political pull of priests, a terrible teen movie come to life, and a repeat sinner who lied his way into the church. Receive your sacrament of 7 Deadly Zins Red Blend, confess your sins, and tune in for Clergy Crimes.     For a full list of show sponsors, visit
